chapters.title: Chapter 17:  Out on the Ice
chapters.info: Uno Nomesta, p. 347 (390)—A Shienaran officer who accompanied the Emond's Fielders away from Shienar. He is the one who gave orders to Masema before he became the Prophet. He is missing one eye, has a long scar across his face, and has a hairstyle like the typical Shienaran warrior—a topknot tied together and the rest of the head shaved clean. He is currently commanding a unit in Gareth Bryne's army.
